name: NFT Clicker!
description:
NFT CLICKER!

NFT Clicker is a clicker game I made about NFT'S! Make money to upgrade your NFT!
Click the NFT to make money! Simple as that right? Well, it is really...

FEATURES!
1. Mobile Friendly
2. Achivements 
3. Upgrades
4. Catchy Music!
5. Global Leaderboard
6. 4 NFT's to click!

SCREENSHOT THIS GAME'S NFTS!
